#summary Benchmark results for Pentium M on Ubuntu 8.04

= Comments = 

There are a few changes in this benchmark since the last one.  
  * LU, QR, Cholesky are fully decomposed
  * CommonsMath no longer always used block real matrices.
  * Several libraries had been updated
  * Plots are normalized by the best library at each matrix size.
  * How Colt and Parallel Colt computes their results have been changed.
